Version 1.4.3

Small bugfix release.

  • Android 7 target support.
  • Android 6 runtime permissions
  • Fixes during folder selection in settings and during export

Version 1.4.2

Small bugfix release.

  • Fixed interval between forced author updates that was accidentally set to 10 hours instead of 10 minutes.
  • Fixed several rare crashes when switching screens quickly
  • Fixed a crash when publication description contained lists

Version 1.4.1

Small bugfix release.

  • New authors are added to the beginning of the list
  • Added "Mark all as read" with undo on New Publications
  • Fixed crash on New Publications in case of dirty database
  • Fixed crash on author import
  • Fixed crash when failing to download publication

Version 1.4.0

  • Added material design
  • Android 5+ support

Version 1.3.3

Small bugfix release.

  • Fixed crash when downloading publication without a title or some other anomalies.
  • Fixed notification display when more then 4 authors were updated in a single session.
  • Fixed some more crashes when opening large publications on low memory devices.
  • Fixed crash when viewing publication info.

Version 1.3.2

Small feature/bugfix release.

  • Search is now divided in 2 categories: by author name and by keyword. Keyword search looks at author name, publication name, annotations, or any other entity on author page.
  • Fixed typos in russian translation.
  • Restore author add confirmation message.
  • Changed the style of notifications. Now, for version ≥ 4.1 a list of update authors will show up directly in the notification view.
  • Fixed a crash when opening large publications on low memory devices.
  • Added one time showcase view for publication ratings.

Version 1.3.1

Small bugfix release.

  • Fixed crash when starting downloading a publication and existing the app before download finished.
  • Fixed a rare crash when publication was marked as read and then an author was quickly switched.

Version 1.3.0

  • Small redesign
  • Enable updates when device starts/storage mounts
  • Added author search
  • Added publication info screen with images
  • Ability to rate publications and +1
  • Added indicator to group header if it contains a new publication
  • Added "ignore update" feature for marking a publication as ignored
  • Added tutorial showcase views to highlight less understandable in-app scenarios
  • A lot of bug fixes and cosmetic improvements

Version 1.2.1

Small bugfix release.

  • Fixed a crash when adding authors from unknown urls.
  • Fixed a crash when importing authors from unknown urls.

Version 1.2.0

  • Added import and export support. txt and xml formats are supported.
  • Added google back-up. Now the content is synchronized between your devices. Not guaranteed, "backup" and "restore" must be enabled in device settings.
  • Added possibility to add authors from budclub.ru
  • Support for interactive download folder choosing.
  • Fixed author removal. Now all related publications are removed as well.

Version 1.1.2

Small bugfix release.

  • Multiple issue fixes. Specifically for Motorola and Asus Transformer as well as an issues specific to GT-I8150 only.

Version 1.1.1

  • Added option of configuring download directory for publications. When files are saved to a custom folder - they have a meaningful name
  • Fixed several issues due to bad connection and samlib being unavailable.
  • Added option of clearing saved publications. (Clears only the default directory)
  • Added optional publication images when available

Version 1.1.0

Warning: all your publications will be marked as new after the update.

  • Added permission "Storage" for saving publications
  • On long press, publication is downloaded for viewing in apps like CoolReader or AIReader. "Open in browser" functionality was removed and will be added back later.
  • Publication description is save in html format now with working links
  • Fixed several issues related to poor connection
  • Added author multiselection for devices with Android < 3.0
For publication saving and author export, the application needs to write to external storage.
